cardsData.title: Generative Fill
cardsData.desc: The next generation of Generative Fill is now in the Photoshop (beta) app. Create richer, more lifelike images with more control than ever before.

cardsData.title: Text to Image
cardsData.desc: With the new Firefly Image 3 Model, you can create higher-quality images with better composition, photorealistic details, and improved mood and lighting.

cardsData.title: Generative Shape Fill
cardsData.desc: With new Generative Shape Fill, you can quickly fill your vector outline and explore a variety of options that match the look and feel of your own artwork.

cardsData.title: Generative Remove
cardsData.desc: See everything you want and nothing you don’t. It’s easy to remove distractions from the background with Generative Remove powered by Firefly generative AI.
